casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Russell William TUCKER. No. 113A96-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2006. Robert L. McClellan, Greensboro, for Tucker. Danielle Marquis, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of September 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of September 2006."
